ceylon_seeds.about_desc: Ceylon Seeds Ltd is a leading seed supplier in Sri Lanka, committed to providing farmers with high-quality, certified seeds for optimal crop yields. With over 15 years of experience in the agricultural sector, we understand the challenges farmers face and provide solutions through superior seed varieties.

about.story_p1: Founded in 2024, Desert Bloom started with a simple vision: to empower Sri Lankan farmers by providing them access to the highest quality seeds and agricultural expertise.
about.story_p2: We recognized that the backbone of our nation is agriculture, yet many farmers struggle due to poor seed quality and lack of technical support. We bridged this gap by partnering with top-tier suppliers like Ceylon Seeds Ltd. and Island Harvest.
about.mission_text: To cultivate a prosperous agricultural future for Sri Lanka by delivering excellence in seed quality and farmer support.
about.vision_text: To be the most trusted and influential agricultural marketplace, transforming how farmers grow and succeed.
